--------------------------------------------------
ID: CQE250B_00
From: Chalhoub University <Chalhoub.University@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-27 09:05
Subject: Workshop booking reminder: Driving Innovation Workshop, 9:00 AM-12:30 PM, 29 May 2025
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/6e974675-f229-4be5-8274-4b1df53b3acd.png> 

________________________________


Dear Hagop,

We’re buzzing in to let you know that you are booked on the following upcoming workshop:



Workshop: Driving Innovation Workshop
Duration: 4 hours 
Date(s): 29 May 2025, 9:00 AM to 12:30 PM

We look forward to seeing you shortly and request you to arrive at least 10 minutes in advance

If you would like to reschedule or cancel your attendance, you can do so by visiting the link below:
Cancel or Reschedule Workshop <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/mod/facetoface/view.php?f=686> 

With you at heart,
Chalhoub University Team

________________________________


عزيزي Hagop,

نحن نرغب في إعلامك بأنك تم حجزك في ورشة العمل التالية:



ورشة العمل: Driving Innovation Workshop
المدة: 4 hours 
التاريخ(ات): 29 May 2025, 9:00 AM to 12:30 PM

نتطلع لرؤيتك في ورشة العمل ونطلب منك تسجيل الدخول قبل الموعد بمدة لا تقل عن 10 دقائق.
